trans-unit.source: Unable to find a code generator (CodeDomProvider).
trans-unit.target: Unable to find a code generator (CodeDomProvider).

trans-unit.target: Configuration could not be saved. Make sure the configuration file exists and can be edited.

trans-unit.target: The current project does not support configuration files.

trans-unit.target: No services found in the solution.

trans-unit.source: There was an error downloading metadata from the address. Please verify that you have entered a valid address.
trans-unit.target: There was an error downloading metadata from the address. Please verify that you have entered a valid address.

trans-unit.target: '{0}' is not a valid namespace for the service reference.

trans-unit.source: Cannot create a service reference with namespace '{0}' because the name is already in use by an existing service reference, folder or file.
trans-unit.target: Cannot create a service reference with namespace '{0}' because the name is already in use by an existing service reference, folder or file.

trans-unit.source: Unable to add a new reference. One or more references already exists or the 'Metadata' section is not empty in the .svcmap file. Edit the .svcmap file and clear all the entries from the 'Metadata' section.
trans-unit.target: Unable to add a new reference. One or more references already exists or the 'Metadata' section is not empty in the .svcmap file. Edit the .svcmap file and clear all the entries from the 'Metadata' section.

trans-unit.source: A namespace needs to be specified for this service reference.
trans-unit.target: A namespace needs to be specified for this service reference.

trans-unit.source: {0}' is not a valid name for a service reference.
trans-unit.target: {0}' is not a valid name for a service reference.

trans-unit.source: Empty string is not a valid name for a reference group.
trans-unit.target: Empty string is not a valid name for a reference group.

trans-unit.source: Cannot create a reference group named '{0}' because the name is already being used by an existing reference group, folder or file.
trans-unit.target: Cannot create a reference group named '{0}' because the name is already being used by an existing reference group, folder or file.

trans-unit.source: Cannot create a reference group with namespace or name with leading or trailing whitespace characters.
trans-unit.target: Cannot create a reference group with namespace or name with leading or trailing whitespace characters.

trans-unit.source: The .svcmap file cannot be found. It may have been moved or deleted. To generate a new .svcmap file, delete the service reference and add it again.
trans-unit.target: The .svcmap file cannot be found. It may have been moved or deleted. To generate a new .svcmap file, delete the service reference and add it again.

trans-unit.source: The current project does not support service references. To enable Windows Communication Foundation support, change the target version of the Microsoft .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: The current project does not support service references. To enable Windows Communication Foundation support, change the target version of the Microsoft .NET Framework.

trans-unit.target: The configuration for the service reference could not be added due to the following issue: {0}

trans-unit.target: An error occurred while attempting to find services at '{0}'.

trans-unit.target: Cannot get referenced assemblies from the project system.

trans-unit.source: The service reference is invalid, because the .svcmap file ('{0}') cannot be found. It may have been moved, deleted or excluded from the project. To generate a new .svcmap file, delete the service reference and add it again.
trans-unit.target: The service reference is invalid, because the .svcmap file ('{0}') cannot be found. It may have been moved, deleted or excluded from the project. To generate a new .svcmap file, delete the service reference and add it again.
